original_text: Why did you despise the word of the Lord by doing what is evil in his eyes? You struck down Uriah the Hittite with the sword and took his wife to be your own. You killed him with the sword of the Ammonites.
korean_text: 그러한데 어찌하여 네가 여호와의 말씀을 업신여기고 나 보기에 악을 행하였느냐 네가 칼로 헷 사람 우리아를 치되 암몬 자손의 칼로 죽이고 그의 아내를 빼앗아 네 아내로 삼았도다

sentences.original_text: Why did you despise the word of the Lord
by doing what is evil in his eyes?
You struck down Uriah the Hittite with the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 칼로 헷 사람 우리아를 죽였고

sentences.original_text: and took his wife to be your own.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아내를 빼앗아 네 아내로 삼았다

sentences.original_text: You killed him with the sword of the Ammonites.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 암몬 자녀의 칼로 그를 죽였다
